import React, { useState } from "react" import Pdata from './Pdata' const Apple = ({ productItems, addToCart }) => { const [count, setCount] = useState(0) const increment = () => { setCount(count + 1) } return ( <> {productItems.map((productItems, index) => { return (
{productItems.discount}% Off

{productItems.name}

${productItems.price}.00

{/* step : 3 if hami le button ma click garryo bahne */}
) })} ) } export default Apple
